text: Does someone experimented this endless loop on PBFT ?
vp0_1         | 09:31:16.098 [consensus/pbft] recvViewChange -> WARN b3c Replica 0 already has a view change message for view 2 from replica 0
I have have all my peers sending the same warning
also the initiator of chaincode deployment  named  "vp0"

what's the view # of the other peers? it seems vp0 is with view 1 and the other peers' view number is higher than 1 so that vp0 view change doesn't succeed and resend viewChange requests all the time. I met the same issue...
